name: bookmarks-app
description: Web based bookmark tool that is available everywhere.

scripts.version:addCSS:
echo "/* v - $(npm run version:extract --silent)
 * © Miles Nature 
 * Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')
 */
$(cat public/dist/assets/css/styles.min.css)" > public/dist/assets/css/styles.min.css
scripts.version:addJS:
echo "/* v - $(npm run version:extract --silent)
 * © Miles Nature 
 * Build time: $(date '+%m-%d-%Y %H:%M:%S')
 */
$(cat public/dist/assets/js/functions.min.js)" > public/dist/assets/js/functions.min.js
scripts.version:extract: cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]'
scripts.production: npm run version:bump --silent && rm -f public/dist/assets/css/styles.min.css && npm run cleancss && npm run version:addCSS --silent && rm -f public/dist/assets/js/functions.min.js && npm run minifyJS --silent && npm run version:addJS --silent

author: Miles Nature
